short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listen ChepitoRios Online Radio with Chrome Browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Presentacion de artistas de diferentes generos musicales Nacionales e Internacionales Latino Americanos.

Our main reason is to give entertainment to the new generations through the successes of yesterday and have an option to know the musical history of artists who marked an era in the musical world with hits of yesterday of the 70s, 80s, 90s and music current.
likewise we are a platform that supports and supports local artists with activities that allow them to show their talent in local scenarios
